Coveo SearchAlertsMessage Component (CoveoSearchAlertsMessage)

The SearchAlertsMessage component allows the SearchAlerts component to display messages.

You should not include this component in your page. Instead, use a SearchAlerts component, and access the SearchAlerts.message attribute.

disable

  • disable(): void

  • Inherited from BaseComponent.disable

    • Defined in ui/Base/BaseComponent.ts :52

    Disable the component. Normally this means that the component will not execute handlers for the framework events (query events, for example). Component are enabled by default on creation.

    Returns void

enable

  • enable(): void

  • Inherited from BaseComponent.enable

    • Defined in ui/Base/BaseComponent.ts :61

    Enable the component. Normally this means that the component will execute handlers for the framework events (query events, for example). Components are enabled by default on creation.

    Returns void

showMessage

  • showMessage(dom: Dom, message: string, error: boolean): void
    • Defined in ui/SearchAlerts/SearchAlertsMessage.ts :111

    Displays a message near the passed dom attribute.

    Parameters

    • dom: Dom

      Specifies where to display the message.

    • message: string

      The message.

    • error: boolean

      Specifies whether the message is an error message.

    Returns void

Static get

  • get(element: HTMLElement, componentClass?: any, noThrow?: boolean): BaseComponent

  • Inherited from Component.get

    • Defined in ui/Base/Component.ts :385

    Get the bound component to the given HTMLElement. Throws an assert if the HTMLElement has no component bound, unless using the noThrow argument.
    If there is multiple component bound to the current HTMLElement, you must specify the component class.

    Parameters

    • element: HTMLElement

      HTMLElement for which to get the bound component.

    • Optional componentClass: any

      Optional component class. If the HTMLElement has multiple components bound, you must specify which one you are targeting.

    • Optional noThrow: boolean

      Boolean option to tell the method to not throw on error.

    Returns BaseComponent

Properties

bind

bind: ComponentEvents

Inherited from Component.bind

  • Defined in ui/Base/Component.ts :257

Allows the component to bind events and execute them only when it is enabled.

componentOptionsModel

componentOptionsModel: ComponentOptionsModel

Inherited from Component.componentOptionsModel

  • Defined in ui/Base/Component.ts :281

Contains the state of options for different components. Mainly used by ResultLink.

componentStateModel

componentStateModel: ComponentStateModel

Inherited from Component.componentStateModel

  • Defined in ui/Base/Component.ts :269

Contains the state of different components (enabled vs disabled). Allows to get/set values. Triggers component state event when modified. Each component can listen to those events.

disabled

disabled: boolean

Inherited from BaseComponent.disabled

  • Defined in ui/Base/BaseComponent.ts :23

A disabled component will not participate in the query, or listen to ComponentEvents.

type

{boolean}

Inherited from BaseComponent.logger

queryController: QueryController

Inherited from Component.queryController

  • Defined in ui/Base/Component.ts :273

Contains the singleton that allows to trigger queries.

queryStateModel

queryStateModel: QueryStateModel

Inherited from Component.queryStateModel

  • Defined in ui/Base/Component.ts :265

Contains the state of the query. Allows to get/set values. Trigger query state event when modified. Each component can listen to those events.

ID: string

Inherited from BaseComponent.ID

Component Options

closeDelay

closeDelay: number
  • Defined in ui/SearchAlerts/SearchAlertsMessage.ts :43

Specifies how long to display the search alerts messages (in milliseconds).

Default value is 2000. Minimum value is 0.

Minimum

0

Default

2000

Markup configuration example(s) :
data-close-delay='10'

Constructors

constructor

  • new SearchAlertsMessage(element: HTMLElement, options: ISearchAlertMessageOptions, bindings?: IComponentBindings): SearchAlertsMessage

  • Overwrites Component.constructor

    • Defined in ui/SearchAlerts/SearchAlertsMessage.ts :47

    Creates a new SearchAlertsMessage component

    Parameters

    • element: HTMLElement

      The HTMLElement on which to instantiate the component.

    • options: ISearchAlertMessageOptions

      The options for the SearchAlertsMessage component.

    • Optional bindings: IComponentBindings

      The bindings that the component requires to function normally. If not set, these will be automatically resolved (with a slower execution time).

    Returns SearchAlertsMessage
